page.title: 04Shillington 4
page.content: There are three thriving non- conformist churches, Methodist, Primitive Methodist and Congregational. Ecumenical relationships are healthy and fruitful. Cubs, Scouts, Guides, Brownies, Youth Groups, Playgroups, Parents Groups, Womens Groups, groups to enhance ones skills and sporting aspirations or groups to discuss mutual interests: they all thrive here. Politics are varied and lively and if anything needs to be done, people don't sit around talking about it, they set to and do it. At the moment, a group of young mothers are raising money to buy new equipment for the childrens playing field.
